ShoppingCriteriaInput.description: Input component for shoppers to describe their shopping criteria.
specs: allow shopper to describe their shopping needs in natural language
provide a text input for entering criteria
show examples of what to include (age, interests, budget)
show a button to submit the criteria

SuggestedItemsList.description: Displays a list of suggested shopping items with quantity selectors.
specs: display all suggested items with names and reasons
show quantity selectors for each item
have an 'Add to Cart' button for selected items
allow removing items from the suggestions

ShoppingAssistant.description: Main component that manages the shopping criteria input and suggested items display.

data_requirements.description: Fetch suggested items based on shopper's criteria.

details.gql: query GetSuggestedItems($sessionId: ID!) { suggestedItems(sessionId: $sessionId) { items { productId name quantity reason } } }

ShoppingAssistantPage.description: Page for shoppers to interact with the shopping assistant.

details.gql: mutation EnterShoppingCriteria($input: EnterShoppingCriteriaInput!) { enterShoppingCriteria(input: $input) { success error { type message } } }
